New Records: Zac Gallen struck out a season-best 11 in six innings
Key Match Events: Pavin Smith slugged a three-run homer to help the Arizona Diamondbacks record an 8-2 victory over the San Francisco Giants
The Diamondbacks turned the game into a rout in the eighth inning with a six-run edge
Arizona used Jake McCarthy’s infield single and three walks to boost the lead to 4-1 in the third
Post-Match Reflections: The Arizona Diamondbacks ended a three-game losing streak and moved one percentage point behind the New York Mets in the battle for the National League’s second and third wild-card spots
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Diamondbacks pitchers combined for a season-high SEVENTEEN strikeouts tonight
The game was played at Phoenix
